00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_TIMER_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_TIMER_H
00024 
00025 #include <cstring>
00026 
00027 #include <boost/thread/xtime.hpp>
00028 
00029 #include "Logger.h"
00030 
00031 namespace Hypertable {
00032 
00036   class Timer {
00037   public:
00038 
00039     Timer(uint32_t millis, bool start_timer=false)
00040       : m_running(false), m_duration(millis), m_remaining(millis) {
00041       if (start_timer)
00042         start();
00043     }
00044 
00045     void start() {
00046       if (!m_running) {
00047         boost::xtime_get(&start_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00048         m_running = true;
00049       }
00050     }
00051 
00052     void stop() {
00053       boost::xtime stop_time;
00054       boost::xtime_get(&stop_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00055       uint32_t adjustment;
00056 
00057       if (start_time.sec == stop_time.sec) {
00058         adjustment = (stop_time.nsec - start_time.nsec) / 1000000;
00059         m_remaining = (adjustment < m_remaining) ? m_remaining - adjustment : 0;
00060       }
00061       else {
00062         adjustment = ((stop_time.sec - start_time.sec) - 1) * 1000;
00063         m_remaining = (adjustment < m_remaining) ? m_remaining - adjustment : 0;
00064         adjustment = ((1000000000 - start_time.nsec) + stop_time.nsec)
00065                       / 1000000;
00066         m_remaining = (adjustment < m_remaining) ? m_remaining - adjustment : 0;
00067       }
00068       m_running = false;
00069     }
00070 
00071     uint32_t remaining() {
00072       if (m_running) { stop(); start(); }
00073       return m_remaining;
00074     }
00075 
00076     bool expired() { return remaining() == 0; }
00077 
00078     bool is_running() { return m_running; }
00079 
00080   private:
00081     bool m_running;
00082     boost::xtime start_time;
00083     uint32_t m_duration;
00084     uint32_t m_remaining;
00085   };
00086 
00087 }

00089 #endif // HYPERTABLE_TIMER_H
